title: More than 800,000 Americans have died of COVID-19. An estimated 163,000 could have been saved by vaccines.
content:
1. More than 800,000 Americans have died of COVID-19. An estimated 163,000 could have been saved by vaccines.  CBS News
  2. U.S. passes latest grim milestone of the pandemic: 800,000 COVID-19 deaths  Yahoo News
  3. US reports more than 800000 total Covid-19 deaths, according to Johns Hopkins data  CNN
  4. US COVID-19 death toll hits 800,000  NPR
  5. U.S. covid-19 death toll reaches 800000 as omicron variant poses latest threat  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: COVID-19によって80万人以上のアメリカ人が亡くなっています。推定163,000人がワクチンによって救われた可能性があります。
已有80多万美国人死于COVID-19。据估计，有16.3万人本可以通过疫苗得到拯救。
已有80多萬美國人死於COVID-19。據估計，有16.3萬人本可以通過疫苗得到拯救。
